paper_abstract: The ratio of curvatures of a polynomial curve p of degree n and its blossom curve of degree k at a given point u is a constant depending only on n and k. In this paper analogous properties of polynomial and rational patches (in triangular and tensor Bezier representations) are searched. (c) 2007 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Blossoming and curvatures of surface patches
